original_title: President CIPM SL Ken Vijayakumar wins Outstanding HR Leader of the Year at CEO Awards
original_body_lines: Ken Vijayakumar, the current President of CIPM SL, the nation’s leader in human resource management, was honoured as the ‘Most Outstanding HR Business Leader of the Year’ by the CEO Sri Lanka Magazine’s CEO Awards 2022 ceremony held recently. A passion for people and lending his expertise to drive HR towards a national platform has placed Viyajakumar a cut above the rest. He received this distinguished accolade for his contributions to CIPM and exemplary leadership skills in driving innovation and growth within HR. Ken Vijayakumar serves CIPM SL as President in a voluntary capacity. His full-time designation is as the Deputy General Manager, Human Resources, Administration, Purchasing, and Sustainability at A Baur Company Ltd.
